TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AccessibilityServiceCapabilities extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityServiceCapabilities CanRequestEnhancedWebAccessibility = int32(4)

summary.para: Capability: This accessibility service can request enhanced web accessibility enhancements. For example, installing scripts to make app content more accessible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityServiceCapabilities CanRequestFilterKeyEvents = int32(8)

summary.para: Capability: This accessibility service can request to filter the key event stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityServiceCapabilities CanRequestTouchExploration = int32(2)

summary.para: Capability: This accessibility service can request touch exploration mode in which touched items are spoken aloud and the UI can be explored via gestures.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityServiceCapabilities CanRetrieveWindowContent = int32(1)

summary.para: Capability: This accessibility service can retrieve the active window content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityServiceCapabilities None = int32(0)
